thread.title: Miley Cyrus and the Flaming Lips Perform on Saturday Night Live, Announce Tour
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus and the Flaming Lips Perform on Saturday Night Live, Announce Tour - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Miley Cyrus and the Flaming Lips Perform on Saturday Night Live, Announce Tour
text:
Last night, Miley Cyrus was the host and musical guest on the season premiere of "Saturday Night Live". During the performance, she was joined by her Dead Petz collaborators the Flaming Lips. They did "Karen Don't Be Sad" (introduced by Hillary Clinton), and later, she performed "The Twinkle Song" solo.
And that's not all—Cyrus and the Lips just announced a tour. In a recent interview on "The Tonight Show", Cyrus revealed that the vinyl pressing of Dead Petz will be sold at their shows. Find those dates below the performances.
Miley Cyrus/The Flaming Lips:
11-19 Chicago, IL - Riviera Theatre
11-21 Detroit, MI - The Fillmore
11-27 Washington, DC - Echostage
11-28 New York, NY - Terminal 5
12-05 Philadelphia, PA - Electric Factory
12-06 Boston, MA - House of Blues »
